attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks to public, and the domestic use of fireworks
attributes.additional_details: To increase the quality of life of domestic and wild animals and decrease risk of injury or death to the public.
attributes.background: Legislate against shops selling fireworks to members of the public, so that only professional displays are allowed.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Make fireworks illegal to buy, with the exception of public displays.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591501
